markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ranger's Bramble](/Feats.aspx?ID=1772) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
warden spells

</column>

---

You can cause plants to grow and trap your foes with thorns. You gain the [_ranger's bramble_](/Spells.aspx?ID=775) warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Ranger's Bramble
